generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings extending into the distance, surrounded by trees and sidewalks.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the road, bordered by a grassy area and trees, with pedestrians visible.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and other low-lying vegetation are present along the edges of the road and sidewalk.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy, appearing as a bright, overcast area.
- person: Several people are visible on the right sidewalk, including two men standing and one person walking further away.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the right sidewalk.
- car: Several cars are visible in the distance, driving on the road.
- traffic sign: A yellow traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible along the road, including those supporting the traffic sign and streetlights.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole.
